name: Travelmatch
overview:
Travelmatch tries to differentiate by letting visitors use temperature, food, drink, childrenâ€™s facilities and other variables to find appropriate destinations.

According to the companyâ€™s founder and CEO, Alex Francis, research shows 70% of people decide what they want to do on their trips before they figure out where they want to go. That may well be true, but the elephant in the room is that itâ€™s going to be a hell of a mountain to climb to establish a new travel search engine in a market thatâ€™s long been saturated.

Travelmatch includes videos, pictures, blogs, links to social networks and TripAdvisor reviews for completeness, but the million dollar question is if the site will be able to stand out in the crop of travel-related destination sites and search portals.

milestones.description: Travelmatch debuts travel search engine with backing from Lastminute.com founder
